content:
Time to get down to the rhythm challenge!
The "Hype Bazaar Rhythm Challenge!" event is happening on the stage. Hit the beats and earn unique rhythmic rewards!
Please sign up with the stage host, Aleo.
Good luck and have fun!
The Floral Friendship Fair flower-gifting event is now underway! Flowers can be used to decorate your planet, craft furniture, or be gifted to others. Give or receive flowers to earn Loomi rewards!

Each planet has its distinct charm, and its environment and ecology can vary depending on its cosmic region. Visit those who have nurtured different planets in the Starsea and explore their unique worlds!
With travelers coming from planets far and wide, be kind, help where you can, and the stars just might send a little surprise your way.
The Bazaar will issue Daily Mingle tasks. Completing them will earn you special rewards.
